data.name: Colors Live
data.detailed_description:
Colors Live is a powerful and fun painting game integrated with a vibrant online community.

packed with painting features
  • an interface that takes five minutes to learn
  • tons of different brushes
  • up to ten layers with a canvas size of 2560x1980 pixels
  • export still images and timelapse videos
  • undo, eyedropper, opacity, blending, flip, and much more!

introducing a brand-new painting challenge mode, colors quest!
  • designed for beginners and masters alike, colors quest encourages you to spend a little time painting every day to level up your skills

access the online gallery, directly from colors live!
  • share paintings and make friends with other artists from around the world! admire the 4 million paintings aleady created by the community, each with a unique painting playback

data.short_description: A powerful and fun painting app/game!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i3-2100 @ 3GHz / AMD A8-5500 @ 3.2GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i3-2100 @ 3GHz / AMD A8-5500 @ 3.2GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
